item1:
盘点后差异调整
Difference adjustment after physical inventory count
item2:
有审批权限者做差异数量的审批
Those with approval authority do approval of different quantities
item4:
已完成盘点实际数量的记录
Record of the actual quantity that has been counted
item5:
盘点编号
Physical inventory count number
item6:
托盘货物储存数据、更新盘点数据
Pallet article storage inventory data, update physical inventory count data
item7:
如果无符合条件的盘点数据，系统将提示查无可盘点信息
If there is no eligible physical inventory count data, the system will prompt for no physical inventory count information
item8:
1. 输入盘点编号后点选Query查询盘点数据
Enter the physical inventory count number and click Query to query the physical inventory count data
item10:
已审批后的盘点数据无法再审批
The approved physical inventory count data can no longer be approved
